snippet: The Chinese government has backtracked on building some new plants and appeared to be slowly shifting its focus toward a greater reliance on consumption.
abstract: Chinese government, facing increased protests from a public concerned about pollution and environmental damage, has backtracked on building new factories, and appears to be shifting its focus toward a greater reliance on consumption. (Series: Changing of the Guard)
lead_paragraph: The Chinese government has backtracked on building some new plants and appeared to be slowly shifting its focus toward a greater reliance on consumption.

headline.print_headline: Saying No to Growth in China
headline.seo: Facing Protests, China’s Business Investment May Be Cooling
headline.main: Facing Protests, China’s Business Investment Slows
